section.name: Using the Document translation picker
section.ol:
Make sure the folder which contains the document has translations in other languages. To do this, open the contextmenu of the folder and select 'Translations...'.
Open the document
Click on 'Document'in the toolbar. This will open a submenu.
Click on 'Select translations...' in the submenu. A dialog will be shown which lists documents of the same type in folders which are marked as translations of the folder containing the current document.
Select the documents which should be the translations.
Click OK
